Unbelievable Deals Of Loving

https://saint-angels.itch.io/unbelievable-deals-of-loving

Game about trying to attract your forgotten family members to your apartment by buying cool stuff on tv-shops.

Created for LD37 Jam in 72 hours. Game design & programming by me. Art by Anastasia Prokofyeva aka Mifmorerak.
